title: Unable to enlist connection to existing transaction
body:
### Describe the bug

Trying to use two non-xa datasources with quarkus.datasource.*.transactions=enabled fails

This appears to be a regression - the exception does not happen with agroal 2.1 / quarkus 3.8.1

### Expected behavior

The transaction manager should just coordinate single phase commit transactions for each datasource.

### Actual behavior

When the second datasource is used an exception is raised "Unable to enlist connection to existing transaction"

### How to Reproduce?

See https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus-quickstarts/compare/main...shawkins:keycloak-iss28725?expand=1
